/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and lush green trees that line the street. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise high into the sky, their facades adorned with a smattering of colorful signs and advertisements that add a vibrant touch to the otherwise monochrome palette. The street itself is a hive of activity, filled with cars and pedestrians going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the urban landscape below.
